about_the_game:
Eldritch Town is a classical real-time strategy game at its core. You collect resources, build up your town and your army, research new technologies and protect it all from monsters that come from the sea and from cultists that try to destroy your town from within. You have various resources to manage - both classical ones like iron, wood, money and population and more unique ones like ammunition and madness. The latter one is a concept from lovecraftian horror worlds - the higher madness your population has the more powerful the cultists become, your people get crazy and kill each other more often, etc.

Come back stronger

Eldritch Town is a roguelite game. Every run has multiple objectives you have to complete to win, but if you can't finish those quests and your city gets destroyed, you don't lose everything. You keep resources and your reputation with different characters. If you've met new characters during the run, you'll be able to start with those new characters in your team in the next run.

Massive technology tree

We have also added a massive technology tree with 1000+ nodes (inspired by PoE)! This will guarantee endless build variety and very deep theorycrafting (which we love a lot in all games).

Build your town, manage resources, research tech, build an army and strengthen the walls to defeat hordes of lovecraftian horrors that attack your town from the outside and cultists that disrupt it from the inside.
